samples.question: Why do some people choose to start their own company?
samples.transcript: I think people like to start their own company because how they can do everything that they want independently without like being influenced by other people What are the advantages and disadvantages of family businesses I think running a family business can, can help like your family have more time together. Sometimes it is really not, like, it is, it has some disadvantages when, there can be conflicts in the family and I think that will, if people do not solve the conflicts, I think the family relationship can be ruined. Yeah.

samples.question: So have you achieved anything recently?

samples.question: So how do you feel when you are praised?
samples.transcript: Oh, when someone praises me, I often feel really proud, proud of myself, yeah. And it is like a little pat on my back, that reminds me my efforts are paying off. And, however, I try not to let compliments go to my head, because humble is, being humble is really important. -.

samples.question: So, how often do you praise others?
samples.transcript: I would say that I praise others on a daily basis. Whether it is just, you know, like complimenting a friend's outfit or appreciating their hard work. I believe that giving other compliments can really make their day.

samples.question: So, do you think that parents should praise their children more often?
samples.transcript: Yes, absolutely. I think praises from parents can help children build their confidence and self-esteem. However, I think parents' praises should be based on practical factors because if children are praised really often, they might fear failure and, you know, take things for granted. Okay.

samples.question: So do you know anyone who has broken the law and how did they do it?

samples.question: So what rules should children follow at home?

Like, be aware of their schoolwork, do the homework, and do their personal, personal, things at home.
